message: Let's split the money 60/40. I think this is a fair offer that allows us both to benefit.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, as we both get a good amount.  Let's end this quickly and avoid the inflation!

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer was already quite fair.  Considering the inflation, taking 45 now is worth even less than my first offer.  Let's settle this now with 55/45.
